extension.name: Kaiwhakahaere LLM o te Rohe
extension.description: Whakawhānuitanga VS Code mō te mahi me ngā tauira LLM o te rohe mō te āwhina AI
commands.testCode: Whakaputa Whakamātautau mō te Waehere Kua Tīpakohia
commands.workspaceAccess.toggle: Takitaki Urunga ki te Waahi Mahi

commands.workspaceAccess.disabled: Kua monokia te urunga ki te waahi mahi

settings.llm.timeout: Wa mutunga tono API i roto i ngā mirihere
status.disconnected: Kua wetekina mai i te LLM
chat.placeholder: Pātai tētahi pātai, patohia rānei tētahi tono...
error.connectionFailed: I rahua te tūhono ki te LLM: {error}
error.requestFailed: I rahua te tono ki te LLM: {error}
error.invalidResponse: Whakautu muhu mai i te LLM
workspace.confirmFileWrite: E hiahia ana te kaiāwhina ki te whakarereke i te kōnae '{file}'. Whakaae?
workspace.confirmFileCreate: E hiahia ana te kaiāwhina ki te waihanga i te kōnae '{file}'. Whakaae?
workspace.confirmFileDelete: E hiahia ana te kaiāwhina ki te muku i te kōnae '{file}'. Whakaae?
